import React, { useRef } from 'react' import { PerspectiveCamera,RenderTexture,Text } from '@react-three/drei' import { useFrame } from '@react-three/fiber' const Cube = () => { const textRef =useRef(); useFrame(state => (textRef.current.position.x = Math.sin(state.clock.elapsedTime)*2)); return (
